name: Sand Prison
description:
In the world of Sand Prison it is completely desert only a few places are habitable, living in this environment humans wanted to accept the offers of the deities, then ascend to the merely humans and become a creature able to survive in the environment in which they are found, but not all humans have accepted the offers of the gods so these humans who have refused this gift are called heretics one of them is Abbas, a human who got imprisoned unfairly, Abbas in despair and hatred has made a pact with the forgotten god Mitra the former deity of contracts, and now they are looking for a way out of prison.

FEATURES LIST:

  • Turn-based combat with real-time movement
  • Enemies with different attacks
  • Skills (Playe’s attacks)
  • Movement Grid based, small invulnerability frame window
  • Levels and difficulty progression
